languages.text: {n}Хротко c кислой миной наблюдает, как злобные озадаченные блюстители, пытаются допрашивать серфов, не прибегая к рукоприкладству. Завидев вас, он все также невозмутимо кивает.{/n} "Ваша Светлость".

{n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хротко c кислой миной наблюдает, как злобные озадаченные блюстители, пытаются допрашивать серфов, не прибегая к рукоприкладству. Завидев вас, он все также невозмутимо кивает.{/n} "Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}赫洛卡带着不满的目光，看着愤怒而困惑的执法者试图通过暴力以外的手段审讯船员。当他看到你时，他像往常一样冷漠地点了点头。{/n}“大人，您来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}赫洛卡带着不满的目光，看着愤怒而困惑的执法者试图通过暴力以外的手段审讯船员。当他看到你时，他像往常一样冷漠地点了点头。{/n}“大人，您来了。”

languages.text: {n}Hrotko observa con expresión mohína mientras los guardias, tan furiosos como perdidos, tratan de interrogar a los siervos sin recurrir a la violencia. Cuando te ve, asiente con la misma indiferencia que antes.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko observa con expresión mohína mientras los guardias, tan furiosos como perdidos, tratan de interrogar a los siervos sin recurrir a la violencia. Cuando te ve, asiente con la misma indiferencia que antes.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}怒って困惑するエンフォーサーたちが、暴力に訴えることなく農奴を尋問しようとするのを、フロトコは不機嫌そうに見ている。あなたを見て、彼は以前と同じように淡々とうなずいた。 {/n}「陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒って困惑するエンフォーサーたちが、暴力に訴えることなく農奴を尋問しようとするのを、フロトコは不機嫌そうに見ている。あなたを見て、彼は以前と同じように淡々とうなずいた。 {/n}「陛下」

languages.text: {n}Hrotko sieht wütend zu, als verwirrte Enforcer versuchen, Sklaven zu verhören, ohne Gewalt anzuwenden. Als er dich bemerkt, nickt er dir nonchalant wie eh und je zu.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko sieht wütend zu, als verwirrte Enforcer versuchen, Sklaven zu verhören, ohne Gewalt anzuwenden. Als er dich bemerkt, nickt er dir nonchalant wie eh und je zu.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Hrotko regarde avec une expression amère les prévôts furieux et perplexes qui s'efforcent d'interroger les serfs sans recourir à la violence. Dès qu'il vous aperçoit, il opine à nouveau du chef avec nonchalance.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko regarde avec une expression amère les prévôts furieux et perplexes qui s'efforcent d'interroger les serfs sans recourir à la violence. Dès qu'il vous aperçoit, il opine à nouveau du chef avec nonchalance.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Öfkeli ve şaşkına dönmüş infazcılar, köleleri şiddete başvurmadan sorguya çekmeye çalışıyor. Bu sırada Hrotko, yüzünü ekşiterek bakıyor. Seni gördüğünde önceki gibi lakayıt bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks on sourly as angry, bewildered enforcers attempt to interrogate serfs without resorting to violence. When he sees you, he nods nonchalantly as before.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
